product_name: Native Eyewear Solo Polarized Sunglasses - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Native Eyewear Solo Polarized Sunglasses help your eyes stay as relaxed and comfortable as you are while basking in sun-filled locations. Iron frames come with gray polarized lenses; Sahara Snow frames come with brown polarized lenses; both lenses are suitable for sunny days. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity, and block 100% of harmful UVA and UVB light. Lightweight frames are flexible and durable enough to withstand high-velocity collisions; built-in venting enhances airflow and virtually eliminates fog and condensation. Snap-Back(TM) Interchange lens system lets you switch lenses to accommodate a variety of light conditions and activities; additional lenses not included. Nonslip nosepads and ear stems; cam-action spring hinges; soft case included. Native Eyewear Solo Polarized Sunglasses are best suited for medium to large profiles. Closeout.
short_description: The Native Eyewear Solo Polarized Sunglasses help your eyes stay as relaxed and comfortable as you are while basking in sun-filled locations.
